welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monroeville, the charming city known for its rich history and friendly residents. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westmoreland County Airport provides services for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Westmoreland County Airport offers services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Airside Terminal
terminals.description: The airside terminal at Pittsburgh International Airport is connected to the main terminal and houses the gates for all flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport is reserved for private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
